description: Back in 2014, Tim Currie was invited to participate in a local BBQ competition and he ended up coming out on top, taking away a few major awards with his natural talents for making BBQ that’s especially Smokin’ Hot. Ever since this fateful date, Currie’s has been in flurry of tasty success that can’t be stopped, as they blaze their way through festivals, events, and even more competitions- never failing to amaze Florida foodies with their quite flavorful dishes.  You’ll find all your smokey faves like their BBQ pulled pork, brisket, ribs, chicken, and more. Also be sure to try some finger lickin’ local faves, like their specialty Currie Q Burger or marvelous Meat Mac & Cheese Bowl.For the best BBQ in Southwest Florida, Currie’s Smokin’ Hot BBQ is certainly the perfect truck for you.
name: Currie's Smokin' Hot BBQ
